title: Who We Are
description: Meet the expert team driving Tetrad AI's success.

members.name: Rasitha Liyanage
members.specialization: Specialized in Data Engineering, Analytics Engineering, Power BI/SSAS
members.bio: Tech Lead with 7+ years of experience in Data Engineering and Business Intelligence solutions. Rasitha specializes in data migrations, data warehousing, and Power BI architecture for enterprise clients.

members.name: Rajith Lahiru
members.position: Associate Data Engineer | BSc(Hons) Computer Science
members.bio: Associate Data Engineer focused on building scalable data pipelines and optimizing data workflows. Rajith brings expertise in modern data engineering tools and cloud infrastructure.

members.name: Kasun Dulara
members.bio: AI Solutions Architect with 5 years of experience in AI and software development. Kasun specializes in building intelligent systems and deploying AI agents for business automation.

members.name: Naveen Prabodha
members.bio: Data Analyst specializing in advanced data visualization and pattern recognition. Naveen creates compelling dashboards and uncovers actionable insights from complex datasets.
